CustomField.inlineHelpText: To be set by Project Manager
CustomField.label: Overall Status

value.fullName: Green - Progressing as planned; on schedule, no critical path/impacting issues identified.
value.label: Green - Progressing as planned; on schedule, no critical path/impacting issues identified.

value.fullName: Yellow - Factors exist that threaten to impact the schedule. The plan could be impacted if appropriate remediation is not agreed to by responsible parties within the stated timeframe.
value.label: Yellow - Factors exist that threaten to impact the schedule. The plan could be impacted if appropriate remediation is not agreed to by responsible parties within the stated timeframe.

value.fullName: Red - Progress is being impacted. Items require immediate remediation or resolution by the responsible parties within the stated timeframes.
value.label: Red - Progress is being impacted. Items require immediate remediation or resolution by the responsible parties within the stated timeframes.
